document_data.name: Orna
document_data.mainbody: '''Orna''' was a former member of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] at the [[Temple of the Black Earth]] in [[Tyar-Besil]] in the 1490s DR.
document_data.Personality: Orna was a greedy and brutal individual. She wanted revenge against the cult.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Orna was in Tyar-Besil. She dared to strike a Black Earth priest, so her fellow cultists captured and jailed her. Some time later, some adventurers defeated the jailer cultists and Orna tried to convince them to free her.
